data.title: Elisabeth Ludovika, Queen of Prussia - a large presentat…
data.meta_description:
Elisabeth Ludovika, Queen of Prussia - a large presentation frame, circa 1860  
Engraved and fire-gilt frame of non-ferrous metal with delicate openwork, tendril décor and stylised eagles. On the top the mirrored cypher "E" underneath a crown. In the center two oval medallions (height of each 7.5 cm) with old photographs of King Friedrich Wilhelm IV and his wife Elisabeth Ludovica. On the reverse a richly decorated, hinged stand with delicate openwork. Traces of wear and age. Dimensions of frame 32 x 29.5 cm. Very rare, early presentation frame.
Princess Elisabeth Ludovika of Bavaria (1801 - 1873) married the later King Friedrich Wilhelm IV of Prussia on 29 November 1823. Theirs was a happy marriage, and Elisabeth cared for Friedrich Wilhelm during the last phase of his life until 1861.
Condition: II
